description:
A professional Windows application for viewing CAD models created or exported in STL (STereoLithography) file format from 3D systems

STL Viewer is a professional Windows application for viewing CAD models created or exported in STL (STereoLithography) file format from 3D systems. The viewer boast a very user-friendly interface for non-technical users, while providing full range of tools for navigation and analyzing 3D objects.
Viewing stereolithography file is easy with STL Viewer. This viewer offers the most of the known commands used in 3D viewers like zooming, panning, changing projections (camera) modes, change draw stile from shade to solid or wireframe. Unique functionality of STL Viewer is ability to changing color of wireframes or shade 3D objects and makes them look more beautiful.
